title: Document Patient Outreach Call
description: A care manager calls a high-risk patient to check on their status after a recent hospital discharge.

tasks.description: Open the patient's record in the care management platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Care manager finds the correct patient.

tasks.description: Make the phone call to the patient.
tasks.expected_outcome: The care manager speaks with the patient to assess their condition.

tasks.description: Document the call in a new note, including that the patient has scheduled their follow-up appointment and has obtained their medications.
tasks.expected_outcome: The outreach attempt and its outcome are documented, closing the loop on the post-discharge follow-up.
